vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.5;
son of: Adaiah (H5718M);
father of: Col-hozeh (H3626H)
§ Hazaiah = "God has seen"
an exile and descendant of Shelah of the tribe of Judah who returned in the time of Nehemiah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Adías; ancestro de Maaseías; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈賽雅 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝已看見"
尼希米時期一個被擄歸回的猶大支派法勒斯的後裔 (尼11:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈赛雅 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝已看见"
尼希米时期一个被掳归回的犹大支派法勒斯的后裔 (尼11:5)
